data.title: Terry Farrell Net Worth 2024: Insights and Surprises
data.meta_description: Explore Terry Farrell net worth 2024 with insights from RachelParris. Discover financial details and what makes her one of the top net worth TV actresses.
data.text:
Curious about Terry Farrell net worth? Terry Farrell, celebrated for her roles on screen, stands out in this exclusive category. In this brief exploration, RachelParris dives into the financial world of Terry, shedding light on what makes her one of the top net worth TV actresses. Stay tuned for an intriguing financial portrait!

Quick Facts

What is the Net Worth Of Terry Farrell in 2024?

Terry Farrell’s net worth in 2024 is estimated at $15 million. This substantial amount highlights her successful career in both modeling and acting.

For context, her net worth is quite comparable to her Star Trek: Deep Space Nine co-star Nana Visitor, who has a net worth of around $4 million.

Meanwhile, Shawnee Smith, known for her roles in the Saw series and Becker, has a net worth of approximately $3 million. Terry’s financial success stems from her diverse career and smart investments.

Career Highlights and Earnings

Terry Farrell began her career as a model, quickly making a name for herself with Elite modeling agency. She graced the covers of prestigious magazines like Vogue, which set the stage for her transition into acting.

Her role as Jadzia Dax on Star Trek: Deep Space Nine was a game-changer, earning her both fame and fortune. The success continued with her role as Regina Reggie Kostas on Becker, adding significantly to her income.

Major Financial Milestones

Terry’s earnings from significant roles in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine and Becker were pivotal financial milestones. These roles not only brought her fame but also lucrative contracts.

For instance, the pay for a leading role in a popular TV series can range from $50,000 to $100,000 per episode, contributing greatly to her net worth.

Moreover, her modeling career and endorsements further padded her bank account, making these milestones critical to her financial journey.

Voice Acting and Other Projects

Voice acting also added to Terry’s income. She voiced Six of One in the animated short film Tripping the Rift. Although she only voiced the character once on television, this project showcased her versatility and added another revenue stream.

Public Appearances and Conventions

Public appearances at conventions, such as GalaxyCon, have been another source of income for Terry. These events not only bring her closer to fans but also provide significant earnings, helping maintain her $15 million net worth.

Her participation in these conventions underscores her lasting popularity and relevance in the entertainment industry.

Honors and Recognitions

Her honors and recognitions have also played a role in her financial success. Notably, an asteroid was named 26734 Terryfarrell in her honor. These accolades boost her public image, further enhancing her marketability and financial opportunities.

Social Media Accounts

FAQs about Terry Farrell

Who is Terry Farrell?

She is an American actress and former fashion model. She is best known for her role as Jadzia Dax in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine and as Reggie Kostas in the TV series Becker.

When and where was she born?

She was born on November 19, 1963, in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, USA .

How old is Terry Farrell?

As of 2024, she is 60 years old .

What character did Terry play on Becker?

She played Regina Reggie Kostas on the TV sitcom Becker .

Who is Terry married to?

She is married to Adam Nimoy, son of Leonard Nimoy. They got married on March 26, 2018.

Does Terry Farrell have any children?

Yes, she has a son named Max Baker from her previous marriage to Brian Baker .

What is Terry Farrell’s height?

She is 5 feet 11 inches (1.82 meters) tall .

What other notable roles has Terry played?

Apart from Star Trek: Deep Space Nine and Becker, she has appeared in Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth and provided the voice for Six of One in the animated series Tripping the Rift

What did Terry Farrell do after retiring from acting?

After retiring from acting in 2002, she focused on her family, sewing, and yoga. She briefly returned to acting in the fan film Star Trek: Renegades .

Conclusion

To wrap up, Terry Farrell’s net worth showcases her successful career in the entertainment industry. Visit rachelparris.com for more insights into her earnings and achievements. Thanks for reading!
